channel.title: Help
channel.description: i need help how do i change an item for ex frost dragon bones thay give u 900k each bone when u use them on alter how can i change it so it gives u 400k? thanks

item.title: Help
item.dc:creator: @AndysAwsome AndysAwsome
item.description:
@AndysAwsome wrote:

Xxp3restr:

i need help how do i change an item for ex frost dragon bones thay give u 900k each bone when u use them on alter how can i change it so it gives u 400k? thanks

There’s no need for so much information about your server, what you have tryed, the use of spellcheck. Regardless

  1. Open, your “server folder”
  2. Type in “frost dragonbone” in the search tab on the top right of the window. (Depending on the type of PC your using you may have a different way to use this “search”
  3. Find the id for “frost dragonbone”
  4. Use this “id” in the “seach” That we talked about at Step 1.
  5. Find/change this items value in the item list. (Found in your Models Folder)
  6. Find/change the snippet of code that gives the player 900k to 400k (Use the “Search” with the “item id” frost dragonbones.
  7. Compile

Read full topic
